meanings.definition: To press or crimp (a fabric) with a heated iron or tool.
meanings.sent1: She gauffers the edges of the tablecloth to make it look fancy.
meanings.sent2: The seamstress gauffers the dress to give it a decorative edge.
meanings.sent3: The chef gauffers the pie crust for a unique presentation.
meanings.sent4: The artist gauffers the paper to create intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: He gauffers the ribbon to add a special touch to the gift.
